Vaccination with MMR is the 
best protection for future 
pregnancies, against rubella, 
as well as measles and 
mumps.
If you are not immune and 
you come into contact with 
someone who has rubella or if 
you develop a rash you should 
tell your midwife or GP at 
once. A blood test will then be 
carried out to show if you have 
been infected.
Sexually transmitted 
infections
Sexually transmitted 
infections (STIs) are on the 
increase. The most common 
is chla
